content: Insurance Asked by AnonymousAsked on 16 Aug 2019Hello all, is FWD cancer insurance premiums level?? (= Thought of purchasing if it is as it covers me all the way till 85 years old?1 answerAnswerBump0

JJJingYu Janice ChinLevel 1. FreshieAnswered on 23 Aug 2019Hi! No, FWD cancer insurance premiums are NOT level. This policy is renewable yearly and the premiums increases as you renew it.
